Huawei: ip ip-prefix SYSTEM permit 10.2.65.10 32 greater-equal 32 less-equal 32
Comments: Both configurations define a prefix list named 'SYSTEM' with the same IP prefix and specify that only prefixes with a length of exactly 32 bits should match.

Huawei:
route-policy EXPORT_to_OSPF permit node 10
 if-match protocol direct
 if-match ip-prefix SYSTEM
 apply cost-type external
ospf
 filter-policy route-policy EXPORT_to_OSPF export
Comments: Both configurations create a policy statement/route-policy named 'EXPORT_to_OSPF', use node number 10, specify matching routes from the 'direct' protocol, use the prefix list 'SYSTEM' for matching, and export to OSPF. The 'type 1' in Nokia is functionally similar to 'apply cost-type external' in Huawei.
Additional fragment in Huawei configuration. It sets the cost type, which is not explicitly present in the Nokia configuration.
